I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
x: nat
n: nat

Goal:
power (S n) x = x * power n x

Premises:
Notation power := (mscal Init.Nat.mul 1)
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
power_0 : forall x : nat, power 0 x = 1
mscal_S : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X) (n : nat) (x : X), mscal m u (S n) x = m x (mscal m u n x)
mscal_plus1 : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X), monoid_theory m u -> forall (n : nat) (x : X), mscal m u (S n) x = m (mscal m u n x) x
Nat2Z.inj_succ : forall n : nat, Z.of_nat (S n) = Z.succ (Z.of_nat n)
Nat.divide = fun x y : nat => exists z : nat, y = z * x : nat -> nat -> Prop Arguments Nat.divide (_ _)%nat_scope
binomial_Newton : forall (X : Type) (sum times : X -> X -> X) (zero one : X), monoid_theory sum zero -> (forall x y : X, sum x y = sum y x) -> (forall x u v : X, sum x u = sum x v -> u = v) -> monoid_theory times one -> (forall x y z : X, times x (sum y z) = sum (times x y) (times x z)) -> (forall x y z : X, times (sum y z) x = sum (times y x) (times z x)) -> forall (n : nat) (a b : X), times a b = times b a -> mscal times one n (sum a b) = msum sum zero (S n) (fun i : nat => mscal sum zero (binomial n i) (times (mscal times one (n - i) a) (mscal times one i b)))
binomial_SS : forall n p : nat, binomial (S n) (S p) = binomial n p + binomial n (S p)
Nat.pred_succ : forall n : nat, Nat.pred (S n) = n
f_equal_nat : forall (B : Type) (f : nat -> B) (x y : nat), x = y -> f x = f y
msum_S : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X) (n : nat) (f : nat -> X), msum m u (S n) f = m (f 0) (msum m u n (fun n0 : nat => f (S n0)))
eq_S : forall x y : nat, x = y -> S x = S y
BinPosDef.Pos.to_nat = fun x : positive => BinPosDef.Pos.iter_op Init.Nat.add x 1 : positive -> nat Arguments BinPosDef.Pos.to_nat _%positive_scope : simpl never
sum_0n_distr_l : forall (X : Type) (sum times : X -> X -> X) (zero one : X), monoid_theory sum zero -> (forall x u v : X, sum x u = sum x v -> u = v) -> monoid_theory times one -> (forall x y z : X, times x (sum y z) = sum (times x y) (times x z)) -> forall (b : X) (n : nat) (f : nat -> X), msum sum zero n (fun i : nat => times b (f i)) = times b (msum sum zero n f)
Init.Nat.div = fun x y : nat => match y with | 0 => y | S y' => fst (Init.Nat.divmod x y' 0 y') end : nat -> nat -> nat Arguments Init.Nat.div (_ _)%nat_scope
msum_plus1 : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X), monoid_theory m u -> forall (n : nat) (f : nat -> X), msum m u (S n) f = m (msum m u n f) (f n)
times_zero_r : forall (X : Type) (sum times : X -> X -> X) (zero one : X), monoid_theory sum zero -> (forall x u v : X, sum x u = sum x v -> u = v) -> monoid_theory times one -> (forall x y z : X, times x (sum y z) = sum (times x y) (times x z)) -> forall x : X, times x zero = zero
Init.Nat.modulo = fun x y : nat => match y with | 0 => y | S y' => y' - snd (Init.Nat.divmod x y' 0 y') end : nat -> nat -> nat Arguments Init.Nat.modulo (_ _)%nat_scope
scal_one : forall (X : Type) (sum times : X -> X -> X) (zero one : X), monoid_theory sum zero -> (forall x u v : X, sum x u = sum x v -> u = v) -> monoid_theory times one -> (forall x y z : X, times x (sum y z) = sum (times x y) (times x z)) -> (forall x y z : X, times (sum y z) x = sum (times y x) (times z x)) -> forall (k : nat) (x : X), mscal sum zero k x = times (mscal sum zero k one) x
scal_one_comm : forall (X : Type) (sum times : X -> X -> X) (zero one : X), monoid_theory sum zero -> (forall x u v : X, sum x u = sum x v -> u = v) -> monoid_theory times one -> (forall x y z : X, times x (sum y z) = sum (times x y) (times x z)) -> (forall x y z : X, times (sum y z) x = sum (times y x) (times z x)) -> forall (k : nat) (x : X), times (mscal sum zero k one) x = times x (mscal sum zero k one)
scal_times : forall (X : Type) (sum times : X -> X -> X) (zero one : X), monoid_theory sum zero -> (forall x u v : X, sum x u = sum x v -> u = v) -> monoid_theory times one -> (forall x y z : X, times x (sum y z) = sum (times x y) (times x z)) -> forall (k : nat) (x y : X), mscal sum zero k (times x y) = times x (mscal sum zero k y)
times_zero_l : forall (X : Type) (sum times : X -> X -> X) (zero one : X), monoid_theory sum zero -> (forall x u v : X, sum x u = sum x v -> u = v) -> monoid_theory times one -> (forall x y z : X, times (sum y z) x = sum (times y x) (times z x)) -> forall x : X, times zero x = zero
Record monoid_theory (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X) : Prop := mk_monoid { monoid_unit_l : forall x : X, m u x = x; monoid_unit_r : forall x : X, m x u = x; monoid_assoc : forall x y z : X, m x (m y z) = m (m x y) z } Arguments monoid_theory [X]%type_scope _%function_scope Arguments mk_monoid [X]%type_scope _%function_scope _ (_ _ _)%function_scope
mscal_1 : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X), monoid_theory m u -> forall x : X, mscal m u 1 x = x
msum_morph : forall (X Y : Type) (m1 : X -> X -> X) (u1 : X) (m2 : Y -> Y -> Y) (u2 : Y) (phi : X -> Y), phi u1 = u2 -> (forall x y : X, phi (m1 x y) = m2 (phi x) (phi y)) -> forall (n : nat) (f : nat -> X), phi (msum m1 u1 n f) = msum m2 u2 n (fun x : nat => phi (f x))
gcd.divides_refl : forall x : nat, gcd.divides x x

```coq
intros x n.
unfold power.
rewrite mscal_S.
f_equal.
rewrite scal_times.
rewrite scal_one_comm.
apply f_equal_nat.
apply eq_S.
reflexivity.
Qed.
```
